code: export function handleReservationTimeRendering(reservationTime){if(reservationTime){var reservationTimeDate=new Date(reservationTime);var reservationTimeDateToday=new Date();var reservationTimeDateTomorrow=new Date();reservationTimeDateTomorrow.setDate(reservationTimeDateTomorrow.getDate()+1);if(reservationTimeDate.getDate()===reservationTimeDateToday.getDate()&&reservationTimeDate.getMonth()===reservationTimeDateToday.getMonth()&&reservationTimeDate.getFullYear()===reservationTimeDateToday.getFullYear()){return"Today, ".concat(reservationTimeDate.toLocaleTimeString([],{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'}));}else if(reservationTimeDate.getDate()===reservationTimeDateTomorrow.getDate()&&reservationTimeDate.getMonth()===reservationTimeDateTomorrow.getMonth()&&reservationTimeDate.getFullYear()===reservationTimeDateTomorrow.getFullYear()){return"Tomorrow, ".concat(reservationTimeDate.toLocaleTimeString([],{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'}));}else{return"".concat(reservationTimeDate.toLocaleString('default',{month:'long'})," ").concat(reservationTimeDate.getDate(),", ").concat(reservationTimeDate.toLocaleTimeString([],{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'}));}}}export function formatPhoneNumber(phoneNumber){var cleaned=(''+phoneNumber).replace(/\D/g,'');if(cleaned.length===7){return cleaned.slice(0,3)+'-'+cleaned.slice(3,7);}else if(cleaned.length>=4){var firstPart=cleaned.slice(0,3);var secondPart=cleaned.slice(3,7);return cleaned.length>3?firstPart+'-'+secondPart+'-'+cleaned.slice(7):firstPart+'-'+secondPart;}else{return phoneNumber;}}
